content:
GlyphFontSizingType Enum

Definition

Specifies when the visual style selects a different glyph font size.

In this Article

public enum GlyphFontSizingType
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
GlyphFontSizingType

Remarks

The GlyphFontSizingType values represent the return values of the GetEnumValue method when it is called with an argument value of System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.EnumProperty.

Fields

Dpi

Glyph font size changes are based on dots per inch (DPI) settings.
None

Glyph font sizes do not change.
Size

Glyph font size changes are based on font size settings.
